sn1.8:1: At Sāvatthī. Standing to one side, that devata recited this verse in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn1.8:2: v.13"Those who are utterly muddled about things,Who may be led into others’ doctrines,Fast asleep, they have not yet awakened:It is time for them to awaken."
sn1.8:3: v.14"Those who aren’t muddled about things,Who cannot be led into others’ doctrines,Those awakened ones, having rightly known,Fare evenly amidst the uneven."
